ChangeList.Description: Added the `offboardRequested` member to the **protectionUnitStatus** enumeration.
Added the `offboarded` member to the **protectionUnitStatus** enumeration.
Added the `cancelOffboardRequested` member to the **protectionUnitStatus** enumeration.
Added the **offboardRequestedDateTime** property to the [protectionUnitBase](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/protectionUnitBase?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [cancelOffboard](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/protectionUnitBase-cancelOffboard?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [protectionUnitBase](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/protectionUnitBase?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [offboard](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/protectionUnitBase-offboard?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [protectionUnitBase](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/protectionUnitBase?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
